chapters.title: Chapter 30: What the Oath Rod Can Do
chapters.info: Shein Chunla, p. 658 (795)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah, later raised to the Amyrlin Seat. She began as a strong Amyrlin, firmly in charge of the Hall and the Tower, but by the end of her reign she was a puppet, doing exactly as she was told. See also Amyrlin Seat.
